content:
#!/bin/bash

module load java/1.8.0_20 python/3.5.1 gcc/5.4.0

# usage: 
# remove the log, run a "does it move" test on milestone 5, & log it
#    rm ati/M05.io.log; ati/test_io M05 | tee ati/M05.io.log

# "default" test
cfg0="-g:0 -h:9 -w:7 -k:5 -t:5000 -b:1000"
cfg0="-g:0 -h:9 -w:7 -k:5 -t:5000 -b:5000"
JAR="ConnectK_nolog.jar"        # ATI fixes

echo "Processing " ${1} " : "

for dir in Submissions/${1}_*/${2}* ; do
  found=''
  gname=${dir#*/M0*/}; gname=${gname%%_*}
  log="log/${gname}.${1}_manual.log"
  for ai in "$dir"/*/src/*AI.py ; do
    [ -f "$ai" ] || continue
    gname=${dir#*/M0*/}; gname=${gname%%_*}
    echo  ${gname} ",  python, "
    java -jar $JAR $cfg0 "py:${ai}" 2>&1
    found=1
  done
  for ai in "$dir"/*/bin/*AI.class ; do
    [ -f "$ai" ] || continue
    gname=${dir#*/M0*/}; gname=${gname%%_*}
    echo ${gname} ", java, "
    java -jar $JAR $cfg0 "${ai%.*}" 2>&1
    found=1
  done
  #for ai in $dir/*/bin/*AI ; do
  for ai in "$dir"/*/bin/*AJ ; do
    [ -f "$ai" ] || continue
    gname=${dir#*/M0*/}; gname=${gname%%_*}
    echo ${gname} ", cpp, "
    java -jar $JAR $cfg0 "cpp:${ai}"  2>&1
    found=1
  done
  if [ ! $found ] ; then 
    gname=${dir#*/M0*/}; gname=${gname%%_*}
    echo $gname ", missing" ; 
  fi
  echo
  echo "======================================================================================="
  echo
done
